input: Big news - I accepted an offer at Stripe! Starting next month as a Staff Data Engineer on their payments platform team. I'll be reporting to Jordan Wu. Pretty excited about the scope - it's a step up from what I was doing at Northwind.

input: Quick preference update - I've been sharing our conversations with stakeholders so I need you to switch to prose-style responses instead of bullets. Easier to forward. Also please stop using emojis entirely, trying to keep things more professional. And I moved my availability to afternoons, 2-4pm PT works better with my new schedule since I'm doing deep work in the mornings now.

input: Heads up, I relocated to Austin last month! Still remote for Northwind but enjoying the change of scenery. Texas time zone now - Central. Also I've been picking up Rust lately for the performance-critical stuff we're building. Really enjoying it.

input: Sad update - Pixel passed away last month. She was 4 and had an unexpected health issue. We had some great years together though. On a brighter note, I've gotten really into cycling instead of running - just did my first century ride last weekend. Also finally made the switch to Neovim, the LSP support has gotten really good and I'm way more productive now.

input: Tech stack update - we finished the Dagster migration! Airflow is officially gone. I've also been doing more Snowflake work instead of BigQuery since we're consolidating warehouses. The team standardized on Pulumi instead of Terraform for IaC - much nicer for our Python-heavy team. Oh, and I switched to black coffee lately, trying to cut back on sugar.
